thumb.title: [TAS] PS版 悪魔城ドラキュラX 月下の夜想曲 リヒターモード 全ボス撃破 by despoa & ForgoneMoose in 25:02.18
thumb.description: 転載元https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BQ5DoPQxQYU以下説明文[TAS] PSX Castlevania: Symphony of the Night "Richter mode, all bosses" by despoa & ForgoneMoose in 25:02.18This is a tool-assisted speedrun. For more information, see https://tasvideos.org/6684MTAS originally published on 2025-08-13Castlevania: Symphony of the Night is an action platforming game in the Castlevania franchise and the codifier for the "Metroidvania" subgenre of platforming games. It was initially developed for the Sony PlayStation and was later ported to the Sega Saturn with a few console exclusive bonuses, such as a playable Maria Renard. Taking place four years after Rondo of Blood, Richter Belmont has suddenly went missing, and Dracula's castle has reappeared. Alucard, son of Dracula, takes it upon himself to investigate and take down whoever has caused it to reappear.In this run, Despoa (https://tasvideos.org/Users/Profile/Despoa) and ForgoneMoose (https://tasvideos.org/Users/Profile/ForgoneMoose) play through as Richter, defeating all bosses in record time.
thumb.last_res_body: ﾎﾟﾝﾎﾟﾝｲﾔｧ カラスマン…？？？ 敗因「傘を持って... 蹴って時計を動か... グラントさんにも... リヒター「けつな... 後頭部がナイフだ... お前の現実はおかしい ドッペルゲンガー...

tags.tag: リヒター・ベルモンド
